quotes.quote: The Horrors Persist, But So Do I.
A Little Delulu Sometimes!
It'll Pass.
What Doesn't Kill You, Gives You Trauma.
For old times sake.
Everything not saved will be lost.
quotes.author: Nintendo 'Quit Screen' Message

quotes.quote:
Where must we go, 
 we who wander this waste land, in search of our better selves?
quotes.author: The First History Man, Mad Max: Fury Road

quotes.quote: With great power comes the absolute certainty that you'll turn into a right cunt
quotes.author: Garth Ennis, The Boys, Volume 9: The Big Ride

quotes.quote: But doctor... I am Pagliacci.
quotes.author: Ruggero Leoncavallo

quotes.quote: Don't pay the ferryman until he gets you to the other side
quotes.author: Chris de Burgh

quotes.quote: When Death finds you, may it find you alive.
quotes.author: An African Proverb

quotes.quote: Comfort kills you slowly
So-called pleasures, when they go beyond a certain limit are but punishments
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: You act like mortals in all that you fear, and like immortals in all that you desire
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: For dust you are, and to dust you shall return
quotes.author: The Bible

quotes.quote: All models are wrong, but some are useful.
quotes.author: George Box

quotes.quote: Healthy is merely the slowest form of dying
We’ll burn that bridge when we come to it
But my life, my lover, my lady is the sea
quotes.author: Brandy (You're a Fine Girl), Looking Glass

quotes.quote: One must imagine Sisyphus happy
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: If the product is free, then you are the product.
Ye Tune Kya Kiya?
quotes.author: Javed Bashir

quotes.quote: یہ تُونے کیا کیا؟
quotes.author: Javed Bashir

quotes.quote: Oh. This is probably bad, huh? I think I'm dying. But that's okay. BMO always bounces back.
quotes.author: BMO, Adventure Time

quotes.quote: There goes that dream
quotes.author: The Banshees of Inisherin

quotes.quote: زندگی جینے کی تیاری میں گزر جاتی ہے۔
When you marooned me on that god forsaken spit of land, you forgot one very important thing, mate: I'm Captain Jack Sparrow.
You're off the edge of the map, mate. Here there be monsters.
quotes.author: Barbossa

quotes.quote: Dying is the day worth living for.
quotes.author: Barbossa

quotes.quote: Dearly Beloved, we be gathered here today... to nail yer gizzard to the mast, yer poxy cur!
quotes.author: Barbossa

quotes.quote: For sure, you have to be lost to find a place that can't be found, elseways everyone would know where it was.
quotes.author: Barbossa

quotes.quote: It be too late to alter course now, mateys!
quotes.author: Barbossa

quotes.quote: It's not just about living forever, Jackie. The trick is living with yourself forever.
